
## Public

curl \
  -X GET \
  http://localhost:3000

curl \
  -X POST \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"username":"rob", "password":"password", "email":"rob@email.com"}' \
  http://localhost:3000/registration


## Tokens

curl \
  -X POST \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"username":"admin", "password":"password"}' \
  http://localhost:3000/tokens

curl \
  -X POST \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"username":"rob", "password":"password"}' \
  http://localhost:3000/tokens

curl \
  -X PUT \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VybmFtZSI6ImFkbWluIiwiaWQiOiIxMjM0NTYiLCJpc0FjdGl2ZSI6dHJ1ZSwicGVybWlzc2lvbnMiOnsibXktYXBwLW5hbWUiOnsiYWN0aW9ucyI6WyJhY3Rpb24xIiwiYWN0aW9uMiIsImFjdGlvbk4iXX19LCJpYXQiOjE0NjY3MTYyNTIsImV4cCI6MTQ2NzMyMTA1MiwiaXNzIjoibXktaXNzdWVyLW5hbWUiLCJqdGkiOiJTa2dIdnhDWUIifQ.lvZn2pi95i02mYghDIQ9vdqxC2jO0d1i7MCY7r0aqJFfpldNVGwEc2OBGbtFy_LaV8eCTdnOJi21SAD1KBpkbA" \
  http://localhost:3000/tokens

curl \
  -X DELETE \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VybmFtZSI6ImFkbWluIiwiaWQiOiIxMjM0NTYiLCJpc0FjdGl2ZSI6dHJ1ZSwicGVybWlzc2lvbnMiOnsibXktYXBwLW5hbWUiOnsiYWN0aW9ucyI6WyJhY3Rpb24xIiwiYWN0aW9uMiIsImFjdGlvbk4iXX19LCJpYXQiOjE0NjY3MTYyODAsImV4cCI6MTQ2NzMyMTA4MCwiaXNzIjoibXktaXNzdWVyLW5hbWUiLCJqdGkiOiJyMWdsS3hSdHIifQ.QbbZYGUKN1DKwuIjfmHEXCL6k-Rey_N4c_wRrMnRWvDBsNC708aiprO-4ezyfCW-dpfCb4YqaFdLFzPTGI1RYA" \
  http://localhost:3000/tokens


## Users

curl \
  -X GET \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..uTRIqjS7IUNOyEQ_OaDF7GSOno_O7ijSz6ZGxfzF505fSDVaaQ-A489PZZd4Q6GiPEQ1jsqt_qooczzli8OllFus_ONqSDURL6bq8a_8VA2GaFmXC58azUA68Om6Whc8" \
  http://localhost:3000/users

curl \
  -X POST \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..be1PVrz3pwsoeJbfNyupg5uA33Ypcopme8D8DMW6BdDLU6_eVIJTp2M_P5C9k4ddHsCfM_dPPRFLmVq-XxQJf3dIWIo83W1QigBxNe4QTs3qgdqvk0Xo6fpz0uE47s8B" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"username":"rob4", "email":"rob.m+4@myplanet.com", "password":"password"}' \
  http://localhost:3000/users

curl \
  -X GET \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..be1PVrz3pwsoeJbfNyupg5uA33Ypcopme8D8DMW6BdDLU6_eVIJTp2M_P5C9k4ddHsCfM_dPPRFLmVq-XxQJf3dIWIo83W1QigBxNe4QTs3qgdqvk0Xo6fpz0uE47s8B" \
  http://localhost:3000/users/4

curl \
  -X PUT \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..be1PVrz3pwsoeJbfNyupg5uA33Ypcopme8D8DMW6BdDLU6_eVIJTp2M_P5C9k4ddHsCfM_dPPRFLmVq-XxQJf3dIWIo83W1QigBxNe4QTs3qgdqvk0Xo6fpz0uE47s8B" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"username":"rob19"}' \
  http://localhost:3000/users/8

curl \
  -X DELETE \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..be1PVrz3pwsoeJbfNyupg5uA33Ypcopme8D8DMW6BdDLU6_eVIJTp2M_P5C9k4ddHsCfM_dPPRFLmVq-XxQJf3dIWIo83W1QigBxNe4QTs3qgdqvk0Xo6fpz0uE47s8B" \
  http://localhost:3000/users/8


## Metadata

POST /users/1/metadata

GET /users/1/metadata

PUT /users/1/metadata/2

GET /users/1/metadata/2

DELETE /users/1/metadata/2


## Permissions

curl \
  -X GET \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..be1PVrz3pwsoeJbfNyupg5uA33Ypcopme8D8DMW6BdDLU6_eVIJTp2M_P5C9k4ddHsCfM_dPPRFLmVq-XxQJf3dIWIo83W1QigBxNe4QTs3qgdqvk0Xo6fpz0uE47s8B" \
  http://localhost:3000/users/4/permissions/cred-auth-manager

curl \
  -X POST \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..be1PVrz3pwsoeJbfNyupg5uA33Ypcopme8D8DMW6BdDLU6_eVIJTp2M_P5C9k4ddHsCfM_dPPRFLmVq-XxQJf3dIWIo83W1QigBxNe4QTs3qgdqvk0Xo6fpz0uE47s8B" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"actions":["users:read", "action2", "action3"]}' \
  http://localhost:3000/users/4/permissions/cred-auth-manager

curl \
  -X DELETE \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..be1PVrz3pwsoeJbfNyupg5uA33Ypcopme8D8DMW6BdDLU6_eVIJTp2M_P5C9k4ddHsCfM_dPPRFLmVq-XxQJf3dIWIo83W1QigBxNe4QTs3qgdqvk0Xo6fpz0uE47s8B" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"actions":["action2", "action3"]}' \
  http://localhost:3000/users/4/permissions/cred-auth-manager


## Resources

curl \
  -X GET \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..sTdciCuOataS3g1bmXRLRmV3dueD7tfmiCNi7RPEblRqIVkIFUmfJbMucZhGBC1UycbwnRRwuuIEf3JrusdBeYHOC_4PXqbv6gpJByXQXkqbPamSAr-gRn5Aj8QJ1nj8" \
  http://localhost:3000/resources

curl \
  -X POST \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..5qcbODr4zheOL68v7FImk48qUR6UKAPvzt_6LeYC711SZSGaeQOVTWZbN0robCEeeafzOUkFB1K71oGLJOqWUNewvO3lAWhfzZodSO_gZSFUh3jzB7FpDu0HI7bnNvyx" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"name":"some-other-resource2", "url":"http://somewhere.com", "actions":["action1", "action2", "action3"]}' \
  http://localhost:3000/resources

curl \
  -X GET \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..sTdciCuOataS3g1bmXRLRmV3dueD7tfmiCNi7RPEblRqIVkIFUmfJbMucZhGBC1UycbwnRRwuuIEf3JrusdBeYHOC_4PXqbv6gpJByXQXkqbPamSAr-gRn5Aj8QJ1nj8" \
  http://localhost:3000/resources/2

curl \
  -X PUT \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..sTdciCuOataS3g1bmXRLRmV3dueD7tfmiCNi7RPEblRqIVkIFUmfJbMucZhGBC1UycbwnRRwuuIEf3JrusdBeYHOC_4PXqbv6gpJByXQXkqbPamSAr-gRn5Aj8QJ1nj8" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"name":"yet-another-resource", "url":"http://somewhere.else.com", "invalidProp":"somethingInvalid", "actions":["actionA", "actionB"]}' \
  http://localhost:3000/resources/2

curl \
  -X DELETE \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..5qcbODr4zheOL68v7FImk48qUR6UKAPvzt_6LeYC711SZSGaeQOVTWZbN0robCEeeafzOUkFB1K71oGLJOqWUNewvO3lAWhfzZodSO_gZSFUh3jzB7FpDu0HI7bnNvyx" \
  http://localhost:3000/resources/4


## Permissible Actions for Resources

curl \
  -X GET \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..sTdciCuOataS3g1bmXRLRmV3dueD7tfmiCNi7RPEblRqIVkIFUmfJbMucZhGBC1UycbwnRRwuuIEf3JrusdBeYHOC_4PXqbv6gpJByXQXkqbPamSAr-gRn5Aj8QJ1nj8" \
  http://localhost:3000/resources/2/actions

curl \
  -X PUT \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..sTdciCuOataS3g1bmXRLRmV3dueD7tfmiCNi7RPEblRqIVkIFUmfJbMucZhGBC1UycbwnRRwuuIEf3JrusdBeYHOC_4PXqbv6gpJByXQXkqbPamSAr-gRn5Aj8QJ1nj8" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"actions":["actionA", "action2", "action3"]}' \
  http://localhost:3000/resources/2/actions

curl \
  -X DELETE \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..sTdciCuOataS3g1bmXRLRmV3dueD7tfmiCNi7RPEblRqIVkIFUmfJbMucZhGBC1UycbwnRRwuuIEf3JrusdBeYHOC_4PXqbv6gpJByXQXkqbPamSAr-gRn5Aj8QJ1nj8" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"actions":["actionA"]}' \
  http://localhost:3000/resources/2/actions


## Groups

POST /groups

GET /groups

GET /groups/:id

PUT /groups/:id

DELETE /groups/:id

POST /users/:user_id/groups

GET /users/:user_id/groups


## Memberships

GET /memberships

POST /memberships

GET /memberships/:id

PUT /memberships/:id

DELETE /memberships/:id

POST /users/:user_id/memberships

GET /users/:user_id/memberships


## Friendships

curl \
  -X PUT \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..1SFRfcbZeV---YaXM37t4vlMP6B01BNVvgVqXOMPoJfSSoPD8DcDh3gVb1A65o7ATyVFGXVfhcSRM1fB3_MpcdN1DO31bE5E0PdSnBMdIq3SqCI6ZmaPLUI-uPls2rXb" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{ "status": "accepted" }' \
  http://localhost:3000/friendships/2

curl \
  -X DELETE \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..1SFRfcbZeV---YaXM37t4vlMP6B01BNVvgVqXOMPoJfSSoPD8DcDh3gVb1A65o7ATyVFGXVfhcSRM1fB3_MpcdN1DO31bE5E0PdSnBMdIq3SqCI6ZmaPLUI-uPls2rXb" \
  http://localhost:3000/friendships/2

## User's Friendships

curl \
  -X POST \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..1SFRfcbZeV---YaXM37t4vlMP6B01BNVvgVqXOMPoJfSSoPD8DcDh3gVb1A65o7ATyVFGXVfhcSRM1fB3_MpcdN1DO31bE5E0PdSnBMdIq3SqCI6ZmaPLUI-uPls2rXb" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"usernames": ["rob", "another-user", "harry"] }' \
  http://localhost:3000/users/1/friendships

curl \
  -X GET \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..1SFRfcbZeV---YaXM37t4vlMP6B01BNVvgVqXOMPoJfSSoPD8DcDh3gVb1A65o7ATyVFGXVfhcSRM1fB3_MpcdN1DO31bE5E0PdSnBMdIq3SqCI6ZmaPLUI-uPls2rXb" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  http://localhost:3000/users/1/friendships

curl \
  -X GET \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..1SFRfcbZeV---YaXM37t4vlMP6B01BNVvgVqXOMPoJfSSoPD8DcDh3gVb1A65o7ATyVFGXVfhcSRM1fB3_MpcdN1DO31bE5E0PdSnBMdIq3SqCI6ZmaPLUI-uPls2rXb" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  http://localhost:3000/users/1/friends
